mapper.update: UPDATE member SET auth_yn = 'Y' WHERE member_id = #{memberID};
UPDATE member_auth SET auth_yn = 'Y' WHERE member_seq = #{memberSeq};
mapper.select: SELECT ma.auth_num FROM member_auth ma JOIN member m ON ma.member_seq = m.member_seq WHERE m.email = #{email};
mapper.update: UPDATE member_auth ma JOIN member m ON ma.member_seq = m.member_seq SET ma.auth_num = NULL WHERE m.email = #{email};
UPDATE member_auth ma JOIN member m ON ma.member_seq = m.member_seq SET ma.auth_num = #{authNum}, ma.expire_dtm = DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 MINUTE) WHERE m.email = #{email};
mapper.select: SELECT ma.expire_dtm FROM member_auth ma JOIN member m ON ma.member_seq = m.member_seq WHERE m.email = #{email} ;
